Uses of Class
bt.tracker.TrackerRequestBuilder

  • Packages that use TrackerRequestBuilder 
    Package Description
    bt.tracker  
    bt.tracker.http  

    • Uses of TrackerRequestBuilder in bt.tracker

      Methods in bt.tracker that return TrackerRequestBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      TrackerRequestBuilder TrackerRequestBuilder.downloaded​(long downloaded)
      Optionally set the amount of data downloaded during the current session.
      TrackerRequestBuilder TrackerRequestBuilder.left​(long left)
      Optionally set the amount of data left for the client to download.
      default TrackerRequestBuilder Tracker.request​(Torrent torrent)
      Deprecated. 
      since 1.3 in favor of Tracker.request(TorrentId)
      TrackerRequestBuilder Tracker.request​(TorrentId torrentId)
      Build a tracker request for a given torrent.
      TrackerRequestBuilder TrackerRequestBuilder.uploaded​(long uploaded)
      Optionally set the amount of data uploaded during the current session.
